scripts.noDeployFlow: ts-node ./scripts/5.createDeposit.ts && sleep 120 && ts-node ./scripts/6.executeDeposit.ts && sleep 30 && ts-node ./scripts/7.createLongOrder.ts && ts-node ./scripts/8.executeLongOrder.ts
scripts.fullDeployFlow: ts-node ./scripts/1.deployApp.ts && sleep 30 && ts-node ./scripts/2.grantRoles.ts && sleep 30 && ts-node ./scripts/3.createMarket.ts && sleep 30 && ts-node ./scripts/4.configMarket.ts && sleep 30 && ts-node ./scripts/5.createDeposit.ts && sleep 120 && ts-node ./scripts/6.executeDeposit.ts && sleep 30 && ts-node ./scripts/7.createLongOrder.ts && sleep 30 && ts-node ./scripts/8.executeLongOrder.ts
scripts.customFlow: ts-node ./scripts/1.deployApp.ts && sleep 30 && ts-node ./scripts/2.grantRoles.ts && sleep 30 && ts-node ./scripts/3.createMarket.ts && sleep 30 && ts-node ./scripts/4.configMarket.ts && sleep 30 && ts-node ./scripts/5.createDeposit.ts && sleep 120 && ts-node ./scripts/6.executeDeposit.ts
